CustomField.formula: CASE( Pricing_Division__c , 'CRC' , Quote__r.Margin_Aluminum_Conduit_Fittings_Per__c, 'ALFITT' , Quote__r.Margin_Conduit_Cable_Fittings__c, 'STEELCON / ECN' , Quote__r.Margin_Steel_Conduit_ECN__c, 'AFC' , Quote__r.Margin_ElectricalCableFlexConduit__c, 'MTLFRM', Quote__r.Margin_Metal_Framing__c, 'PPC', Quote__r.Margin_Plastic_Pipe_Conduit__c, NULL )
CustomField.label: Margin %
